API Evangelist Location API Checklist

This is the checklist for guiding this API through the lifecycle, helping this API deliver its resources in alignment with other APIs in operation across this platform.

Definition
Organization (Active) - Define the organization for this service.
Github organization:
Repository (Active) - Establish a Github repository.
Github repository:
README (Active) - Craft a README for the repository.
Readme path:
Service Name (Active) - Provide title for the service.
Service name:
Service Description (Active) - Provide concise description for the service.
Service description:

Service goals: Goals:

descripton:

Title:

Design

Url:

Number of paths:

Get:

Parameters (Active) - Define a list of query parameters in use to work with service.
Number of parameters:

Number of headers:

Number of bodies:
Beyond Verbs (Active) - Define how actions are being defined as part of this service beyond the usage of common HTTP verbs.
Media Types (Active) - Define whether service will return CSV, JSON, and / or XML responses.
Json:
Xml:
Html:

200:

500:
Filtering (Active) - Define how filtering will be handled for requests and responses.
Used:
Pagination (Active) - Define how pagination will be handled for requests and responses.
Used:
Sorting (Active) - Define how sorting will be handled for requests and responses.
Used:
Response(s) (Active) - Provide a resulting message and associated schema definition for the service.
Number of headers:
Errors (Active) - Provide a schema definition, and apply error handling as part of the wider HTTP status code usage.
